results.content: I didn't have too much knowledge from Joomla, but this course helped me a lot to understand how to build a Forum using Joomla. Congratulations Mat

results.content: If you want to know how to create a membership forum with Joomla, then I suggest to watch this course. Very recommended course specially for newbies in creating forum with Joomla.
